text:
Marianna Markina (; 13 November 1986, Leningrad, USSR) is a Russian actress, model, writer and blogger.
Biography.
Marianna Markina was born in Saint Petersburg.
In 2009, she graduated from the Saint Petersburg State University of Culture and Arts, department of directing and acting (master of the course V. I. Plotkin).
In 2007-2011, Markina was an actress of the theater “Wizards”.
In 2019, she was named Playboy magazine's “Girl of the Year”.
In December 2019, Marianna Markina released the book “#they loved on the Internet” () at Eksmo publishing house.
